hints.title: End-to-End Geometrothermodynamic Analysis
hints.content:
3509: :label: alg-end-to-end-geometrothermodynamics
3510: 
3511: **Input:** Initial Fragile Gas configuration, thermodynamic parameters $\theta_0 = (T_0, V_0, N_0)$, target accuracy $\epsilon$
3512: 
3513: **Output:** Ruppeiner/Weinhold metrics, scalar curvature, phase transition diagnostics
3514: 
3515: **Step 1: QSD Convergence**
3516: - Run Euclidean Gas or Adaptive Gas until QSD convergence (Chapter 4)
3517: - Monitor KL-divergence rate (Chapter 10)
3518: - Collect $N \sim \epsilon^{-(d+4)/2}$ samples (from convergence analysis)
3519: 
3520: **Step 2: Fisher Information Matrix**
3521: - Use Algorithm {prf:ref}`alg-fisher-matrix-estimation` with KDE bandwidth $h = N^{-1/(d+4)}$
3522: - Apply finite difference perturbations with $\delta = N^{-1/(d+4)}$
3523: - Estimate $\hat{g}_{\text{Fisher}}(\theta_0)$ with error $O(N^{-2/(d+4)})$
3524: 
3525: **Step 3: Coordinate Transformation**
3526: - Compute Jacobian $J = \partial(U, V, N) / \partial(\beta, V, N)$
3527: - Pullback: $\hat{g}_R = J^T \hat{g}_{\text{Fisher}} J$ (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-ruppeiner-fisher-connection`)
3528: - Validate via Algorithm {prf:ref}`alg-ruppeiner-validation`
3529: 
3530: **Step 4: Dual Metrics**
3531: - Weinhold metric: $\hat{g}_W = \hat{T} \cdot \hat{g}_R$ (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-weinhold-ruppeiner-conformal`)
3532: - Check conformal equivalence: $|\hat{g}_W / \hat{g}_R - T| < \epsilon_{\text{conf}}$
3533: 
3534: **Step 5: Curvature Estimation**
3535: - Use Algorithm {prf:ref}`alg-ruppeiner-curvature` with importance reweighting
3536: - Compute Christoffel symbols via finite differences
3537: - Calculate scalar curvature $\hat{R}_{\text{Rupp}}$ with error $O(N^{-2/(d+4)})$
3538: 
3539: **Step 6: Phase Transition Detection**
3540: - Track $\hat{R}(T)$ over temperature range
3541: - Identify peaks/divergences indicating criticality (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-ruppeiner-curvature-phase-transition`)
3542: - Compare to known phase transitions (if available)
3543: 
3544: **Step 7: Diagnostics and Reporting**
3545: - Effective sample size from importance weights
3546: - Convergence plots: metric vs. $N$, curvature vs. $T$
3547: - Uncertainty quantification via bootstrap
3548: 
3549: **Complexity:** $O(N \cdot d^3)$ for Steps 1-3, $O(5N \cdot d^3)$ for Step 5 (5 QSD runs)
